changelog.changenotes:
- Bug fixes
> Fixed topbar icon no updating after changing icon style.
> Fixed missing right arrow in login history (Droptop Four - Icon Style).
> Fixed issues with startup.

- Modifications
> Improved interface
> Removed dropdown animations (added by me).
- Bug fixes
> Fixed toggle icon no flipping.
> Fixed static info in login history.

> New Dropdown animations. (This can be disabled if someone feel like it's too slow).

> Improved interface.
> Modified Icon Styles to match in chekboxs and radio buttons.

- **v24.0625.1**

> Smoother animations.
> Reduced time for animations.

- **v24.0625.2**

> App is now able to save and display the logged time during the day into dropdown menu.
> Added 7 Icon Styles in App Settings, this styles can modify every icon in the app and topbar.
- Modifications
> Improved interface.
> Increased data logging.
> Removed option to show PC time in the top bar, it will only show the time since login.
> Removed option for smart time, it is now built-in in the app.
> Removed option for manual time.
> Removed option to add leading zeros.
> Moved Donations buttons in Support me button.
- Bug fixes
> Fixed issue where the app uses more memory and CPU usage more than usual.
- Performance
> Less load of measures for background processes.
> Less load of elements for the top bar.
> Less memory and cpu usage for rainmeter.

- Features:
  - `Dropdown preferences` setting.

  - `User History Format` setting.
  - `Update` button in App Settings.
  - `Buy Me A Coffee` button in App Settings.
*Both buttons can be hidden when you double press the right click on the button.

- Minor Bug Fix:
  - `User History` box overlapping other box.
  - `WebViewHeight` is unknown.

- Added "User Login History" into App.
> Now app registry your login time.

- Added "**Smart Time**" setting.

- Minor bug fix.
